description:
900 Health
100% Base Health Regen

Colossal Consumption (0s) per target
If an enemy champion is nearby for a few seconds, your next Attack against them deals 70 plus 6% of your max Health as bonus physical damage and grants 8% of the damage as max Health.

Goliath
For each 1000 max Health, gain 3% increased size, up to 30%.
name: Heartsteel
plaintext: Restores Health on kill or assist
